Getting iTest

Download binary artifact.

iTest can be obtained in a form of binary maven artifact from Cloudera Maven repository. The repository is located at repository.cloudera.com

All you need to do is to add the following dependency into your project pom

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.apache.itest</groupId>
  <artifactId>itest-common</artifactId>
  <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>

Download sources

You can simply get a source artifact from the same Maven repository

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.apache.itest</groupId>
  <artifactId>itest-common</artifactId>
  <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <classifier>sources</classifier>
</dependency>

Or you can clone iTest workspace from github.com/cloudera/iTest using git
